<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Halfling Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=65) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Halfling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=87" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 53 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Halfling Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=55)

</column>

---

Your halfling affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with halfling weapons. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the [sling](/Weapons.aspx?ID=72), [halfling sling staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=78), [shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43), and all [halfling](/Traits.aspx?ID=87) weapons in which you are trained.
name: Halfling Weapon Expertise
